item.title: Shiny apps with GNIP data
item.description: (in progress) The most basic Shiny app Apps must be embedded in iframes in order to work with static markdown.

item.title: Testing Rmarkdown with GNIP data
item.description: (in progress) Rnotebook setup This notebook requires a few R packages, listed and loaded below: pacman::p_load(here, knitr, blogdown, tidyverse, lubridate, kableExtra, ggthemes) Viewing data Iâ€™ve downloaded a small set of data from the International Atomic Energy Agency Global Network for Isotopes in Precipitation that includes water isotope data collected in the last 15 years from 7 sites around the world. The code chunk that produces this table also cleans up the data for display.
